languages.text: "Во время затяжного варп-перелета, когда корабль уже двадцать циклов кряду блуждал по неизведанным путям Имматериума, голод и мор охватили флагман. Сквозь бреши в сердцах отчаявшихся слуги {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Архиврага{/g} проникли на судно, и мор и голод превратились в омерзительный пир на костях".

"The vessel was beset by famine and pestilence during a long warp jump. The flagship wandered uncharted paths in the Immaterium for twenty cycles straight. Servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g} used the despairing hearts of the crew to infiltrate the ship... and death followed. The hungry became the hunted. The famished became a feast."
languages.original_text: "Во время затяжного варп-перелета, когда корабль уже двадцать циклов кряду блуждал по неизведанным путям Имматериума, голод и мор охватили флагман. Сквозь бреши в сердцах отчаявшихся слуги {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Архиврага{/g} проникли на судно, и мор и голод превратились в омерзительный пир на костях".

traits.locale_text: "During a lengthy warp flight, after the flagship had been wandering uncharted paths in the Immaterium for twenty cycles straight, famine and pestilence beset the vessel. Through breaches in despairing hearts, servants of the Archenemy infiltrated the ship, turning the famine and pestilence into an abominable deathly feast."

"During a lengthy warp flight, after the flagship had been wandering uncharted paths in the Immaterium for twenty cycles straight, famine and pestilence beset the vessel. Through breaches in despairing hearts, servants of the Archenemy infiltrated the ship, turning the famine and pestilence into an abominable deathly feast."

"The vessel was beset by famine and pestilence during a long warp jump. The flagship wandered uncharted paths in the Immaterium for twenty cycles straight. Servants of the Archenemy used the despairing hearts of the crew to infiltrate the ship... and death followed. The hungry became the hunted. The famished became a feast."

The famished became a feast."

Servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g} used the despairing hearts of the crew to infiltrate the ship... and death followed. The hungry became the hunted. The famished became a feast."

languages.text: « Lors d'un saut Warp pendant lequel le vaisseau amiral a erré dans l'Immaterium pendant vingt longs cycles, l'équipage a été frappé par la famine et la peste. Les serviteurs du {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Grand Ennemi{/g} ont profité du désespoir qui régnait alors pour infiltrer le vaisseau... et semer la mort. Les affamés sont devenus les chassés. Puis un festin. »
languages.original_text: "The vessel was beset by famine and pestilence during a long warp jump. The flagship wandered uncharted paths in the Immaterium for twenty cycles straight. Servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g} used the despairing hearts of the crew to infiltrate the ship... and death followed. The hungry became the hunted. The famished became a feast."

traits.locale_text: « Lors d'un saut Warp pendant lequel le vaisseau amiral a erré dans l'Immaterium pendant vingt longs cycles, l'équipage a été frappé par la famine et la peste. Les serviteurs du Grand Ennemi ont profité du désespoir qui régnait alors pour infiltrer le vaisseau... et semer la mort. Les affamés sont devenus les chassés. Puis un festin. »

« Lors d'un saut Warp pendant lequel le vaisseau amiral a erré dans l'Immaterium pendant vingt longs cycles, l'équipage a été frappé par la famine et la peste. Les serviteurs du Grand Ennemi ont profité du désespoir qui régnait alors pour infiltrer le vaisseau... et semer la mort. Les affamés sont devenus les chassés. Puis un festin. »

languages.text: «La nave sufrió hambre y pestilencia durante un largo salto de disformidad. La nave insignia recorrió sendas desconocidas por el Inmaterio durante veinte ciclos seguidos. Los sirvientes del {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archienemigo{/g} utilizaron la desesperación de la tripulación para infiltrarse en la nave... y la muerte los siguió. Los hambrientos se convirtieron en presas. Los famélicos, en banquetes».
languages.original_text: "The vessel was beset by famine and pestilence during a long warp jump. The flagship wandered uncharted paths in the Immaterium for twenty cycles straight. Servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g} used the despairing hearts of the crew to infiltrate the ship... and death followed. The hungry became the hunted. The famished became a feast."

traits.locale_text: «La nave sufrió hambre y pestilencia durante un largo salto de disformidad. La nave insignia recorrió sendas desconocidas por el Inmaterio durante veinte ciclos seguidos. Los sirvientes del Archienemigo utilizaron la desesperación de la tripulación para infiltrarse en la nave... y la muerte los siguió. Los hambrientos se convirtieron en presas. Los famélicos, en banquetes».

languages.text: “在某次漫长的亚空间跳跃中，这艘船落入了饥荒与疫病的魔掌。旗舰在亚空间中沿着未知的航线前进，整整连续转了二十圈。{g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}混沌大敌{/g}利用船上绝望的气氛，渗透到了飞船之中……死亡接踵而至。饥肠辘辘的人们变成了猎物，食不果腹的船员沦为了恶魔的美餐。”
languages.original_text: "The vessel was beset by famine and pestilence during a long warp jump. The flagship wandered uncharted paths in the Immaterium for twenty cycles straight. Servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g} used the despairing hearts of the crew to infiltrate the ship... and death followed. The hungry became the hunted. The famished became a feast."

traits.locale_text: “在某次漫长的亚空间跳跃中，这艘船落入了饥荒与疫病的魔掌。旗舰在亚空间中沿着未知的航线前进，整整连续转了二十圈。混沌大敌利用船上绝望的气氛，渗透到了飞船之中……死亡接踵而至。饥肠辘辘的人们变成了猎物，食不果腹的船员沦为了恶魔的美餐。”

languages.text: 「船は長い永年の抗争の間に飢饉と疫病に襲われた。旗艦は20サイクルの間、非物質世界の未知の道をさまよい続けた。{g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}仇敵{/g}の手下が乗組員の絶望した心を利用して船に潜入し…死人が出続けた。飢えた者は追われる者となり、 飢えた者はごちそうになった」
languages.original_text: "The vessel was beset by famine and pestilence during a long warp jump. The flagship wandered uncharted paths in the Immaterium for twenty cycles straight. Servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g} used the despairing hearts of the crew to infiltrate the ship... and death followed. The hungry became the hunted. The famished became a feast."

traits.locale_text: 「船は長い永年の抗争の間に飢饉と疫病に襲われた。旗艦は20サイクルの間、非物質世界の未知の道をさまよい続けた。仇敵の手下が乗組員の絶望した心を利用して船に潜入し…死人が出続けた。飢えた者は追われる者となり、 飢えた者はごちそうになった」

languages.text: "Das Schiff wurde während eines langen Warpsprungs von einer Hungersnot und von Seuchen heimgesucht. Das Flaggschiff irrte zwanzig Zyklen in Folge auf unbekannten Pfaden durch das Immaterium. Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Erzfeinds{/g} haben die Verzweiflung in den Herzen der Crew genutzt, um das Schiff zu infiltrieren ... und der Tod folgte ihnen. Die Hungrigen wurden zu den Gejagten. Die Ausgehungerten wurden zu einem Festmahl."
languages.original_text: "The vessel was beset by famine and pestilence during a long warp jump. The flagship wandered uncharted paths in the Immaterium for twenty cycles straight. Servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g} used the despairing hearts of the crew to infiltrate the ship... and death followed. The hungry became the hunted. The famished became a feast."

traits.locale_text: "Das Schiff wurde während eines langen Warpsprungs von einer Hungersnot und von Seuchen heimgesucht. Das Flaggschiff irrte zwanzig Zyklen in Folge auf unbekannten Pfaden durch das Immaterium. Diener des Erzfeinds haben die Verzweiflung in den Herzen der Crew genutzt, um das Schiff zu infiltrieren ... und der Tod folgte ihnen. Die Hungrigen wurden zu den Gejagten. Die Ausgehungerten wurden zu einem Festmahl."

languages.text: "Uzun bir öte sıçrama esnasında gemiyi kıtlık ve kıran sarmıştı. Sancak gemisi, Tindiyar'ın keşfedilmemiş yollarında üst üste yirmi döngü boyunca dolanıp durdu. {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Şerbaşı'nın{/g} hizmetkârları, şevkten yoksun düşen mürettebatın çaresizliğinden faydalanarak gemiyi istila etti. Ardından da ölüm geldi. Aç kalan ava, midesi kazınansa ziyafete döndü."
languages.original_text: "The vessel was beset by famine and pestilence during a long warp jump. The flagship wandered uncharted paths in the Immaterium for twenty cycles straight. Servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Archenemy{/g} used the despairing hearts of the crew to infiltrate the ship... and death followed. The hungry became the hunted. The famished became a feast."
